subscribeForPropertyChange

public void subscribeForPropertyChange(String prefix,
                                       PropertyChangeListener<T> listener)
                                throws PropertyStoreException
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: PropertyStore
Subscribe for changes in the property property. Key can be a prefix, Multiple callbacks can be invoked. One callback per change is not guaranteed. Some changes might be missed. That's why one has to read the data on every callback.

Specified by:
subscribeForPropertyChange in interface PropertyStore<T>
Throws:
PropertyStoreException
